channel.title: Adding models help
channel.description: ok i have models in my client and have all the codes in and i just need to add the models they are in the models folder (im using a blurr client) and when i do add model ###### it says model was not found idk hepl plz

item.title: Adding models help
item.dc:creator: @IanDaCJ IanDaCJ
item.description:
@IanDaCJ wrote:

  1. download a model…
  2. extract it if its ONLY a .rar or .zip
  3. place the .Gzip Models In The Models Folder
  4. Open Class8 (client sided) and paste the ints of the item (if it has any)
  5. Compile… and run client
  6. go in game and add models then restart client and it should work ^-^

Read full topic
